scripts.build:client: cd client && npm i && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.start: cd server && npm ci --dev && npm run build && npm start && ../client && npm i && npm run build
scripts.dev:server: cd server && npm run dev && cd ../
scripts.dev:assets: cd client && npm run start && cd ../
